purpose: To automate the process of web testing by allowing users to write specifications that the AI agent interprets and executes, thereby enhancing efficiency and accuracy in quality assurance.
principle: The agent operates on the principle of leveraging natural language processing and machine learning to understand user-defined specifications and translate them into actionable test cases.
reusability: The codebase is designed with modularity in mind, allowing components to be reused across different testing scenarios and projects, which promotes efficiency and reduces redundancy.
limitations: As an alpha version, the agent may have incomplete features, potential bugs, and limited support for certain web technologies or testing frameworks. Continuous improvements are expected as development progresses.
name: auto-inspector
description: Web Testing AI Agent - Write your specs, it does the rest
